title: Detailed interpretation of the elevator in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of the elevator in a dream for the great imams of interpretation in this article “They said small dreams, and we do not interpret dreams with two worlds.” Some of them are messages from God Almighty and may not come true either. Not all dreams are messages and it is better not to stop at dreams and interpret them. Only God Almighty knows the unseen and in this article from the encyclopedia we present to you the interpretation of seeing the elevator in a dream. Interpretation of the elevator in a dream Interpretation of the elevator in a dream by Ibn Sirin The elevator in a dream is good news if it does not break down. If someone sees in a dream that he is going up in the elevator. This indicates a high status among people and a high position. If a person sees that he is going up in the elevator. This indicates that he has reached a prestigious position, and a lot of money. If you see the elevator going down. This indicates a decline in your position among people. If you see yourself going down the elevator? This indicates that there is an obstacle that you will find in your way and it will reduce your determination and readiness. If he sees in a dream that the elevator left him, he goes down. This indicates escaping from a great disappointment. If you dream that the elevator is falling. This indicates hearing unpleasant news, a sudden disgusting event and unpleasant consequences. If he sees in a dream that the elevator has stopped and broken. This indicates a great danger and many obstacles in life. Riding the elevator in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees the elevator going up in her dream. This indicates good luck, and also shows her success and overcoming many crises. Riding the elevator also indicates a rise in her position at work and may also indicate her engagement or future marriage. If the girl sees the elevator going up, it stops at the top floor. This indicates good luck for her. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the elevator is going down. This indicates the bad luck that she will fall into. But if he sees the elevator stopped or broken. This indicates an interruption or delay in marriage or a work matter. The elevator in a young man's dream If a young man sees himself going up in the elevator. This indicates his high status and great success. If a married man sees himself going up in the elevator? This indicates that he will receive a lot of expenses, whether money or children. Elevator in a dream for a married and pregnant woman The interpretation of the dream of the elevator in the dream of a married woman differs. If he sees the elevator going down, this indicates that there is an imminent desire that will be fulfilled. If the pregnant woman sees the elevator; It indicates peace and comfort and indicates the arrival of a baby. Also, the elevator in the dream of a pregnant woman indicates psychological comfort and indicates that the newborn will be male if the elevator goes up and female if the elevator goes down. Seeing the elevator in a dream of a divorced woman Seeing the elevator in the dream of a divorced woman means security, reassurance and stability, and going up in the elevator constantly is good news, and we wish you success in her public life and in all her affairs. If a widow sees a broken elevator in her dream. This indicates that her late husband is the last time she married in her life. The broken elevator in the widow's dream also indicates a lot of money and a lot of sustenance. Interpretation of the dream of the elevator by Al-Nabulsi The elevator in a dream

But if he sees the elevator stopped or broken. This indicates an interruption or delay in a marriage or work matter. Elevator in a young man’s dreamIf a young man sees himself going up in an elevator. This indicates his high status and great success. If a married man sees himself going up in the elevator? This indicates that he will receive a lot of support, whether it is money or children. An elevator in a dream for a married and pregnant woman. The interpretation of a dream about an elevator in a dream for a married woman varies. If he sees the elevator going down, this indicates that there is an imminent desire that will be fulfilled. Also, the elevator in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates psychological comfort and indicates that the baby will be male if he goes up the elevator and female if the elevator goes down. Seeing an elevator in a divorced woman’s dream Seeing an elevator in a divorced woman’s dream means security, reassurance, and stability. And constantly going up in the elevator is good news, and good luck in her public life and in all her affairs. If a widow sees a broken elevator in her dream. This indicates that her late husband was the last time she married in her life. A broken elevator in a widow’s dream also indicates a lot of money and a lot of sustenance. title: Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Nas in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Surah Al-Nas in a dream. In previous articles on the dream website, we published many interpretations of dreams that many of you have and are searching for a suitable interpretation but cannot find. We learn about the interpretation as stated in the books of the scholar Ibn Sirin and Ibn al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about Surat al-Nas by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that seeing Surat al-Falaq and al-Nas in a dream for a person indicates that whoever reads them will reach a great position, his behavior among people will improve, he will be remembered, and God will protect him from temptation and temptation. . His faith will take a leap. He also mentioned that Surah Al-Falaq and Al-Nas indicate that a man humiliates his son and secures a decent and comfortable life for him. Your death is near and your kingdom is near, and what he said has been fulfilled and the righteous has died. And whoever sees himself reciting the two commandments: Al-Falaq and Al-Nas in his dream, this is evidence that the evil of the jinn and mankind will be averted from him, such as sorcery and envy. Ibn Shirin cited the words of Abu Saeed, may God be pleased with him, with testimony: that the original In this vision, the interpreter plans to be the seer's witness. From committing sins and disobedience and punishing him for previous sins with a deserved punishment, and the reference here is abandoning the sin that he is committing in his current state or attempting to commit it. By watching the recitation of Al-Sahl from Surat Al-Falaq or Al-Nas, this indicates that God has repelled the evil of people, their eyes, and their magic from him. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Nabulsi by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of reciting Surah Al-Falaq or Al-Nas as follows: Whoever recites the two prayers or sees one of them being recited to him indicates his union with God Almighty and that he is not blessed with children. If he completes Surat Al-Ikhlas and attains the name of God Almighty and His blessings and protection, then his condition will be answered and his condition will improve. Whoever recites it for the two refugees and is In a state of fear, he is safe, and if he is wronged, God Almighty will help him, and it is said that he will attain sincere repentance and true faith. Reciting Surat Al-Falaq over Al-Nabulsi indicates a good position and victory over enemies, and this insight protects him from the envy of people after changing his position. Al-Nabulsi explained seeing Surat Al-Nas as evidence of Victory in battles and victory. If you read it in a dream, he will be victorious over his enemy and defend himself from the magic of sorcerers and the plots and whispers of Satan, and from the evil of the fanatic and slander, and he will protect his chest from the whispers of Satan. Reciting Surah Al-Falaq or Al-Nas in a dream indicates an encounter with family and people who are safe from his evil and evil. Interpretation of a dream Women in Surat Al-Nas Watching and reading Surat Al-Falaq or Al-Nas for a single girl indicates that she is immune from the evil, envy and conspiracies of the souls around her, and that the way is open for her to achieve her dreams. If an unmarried girl is seen reading Surat Al-Fatihah Al-Nas or Al-Falaq, this indicates the progress of the issue for her And her blessed marriage. Interpretation of a dream about Surah Al-Nas for a man. Watching the recitation of Surat Al-Falaq for a man indicates a blessing in his money, family, work, and expenses. Attending the recitation of Surat Al-Falaq and Al-Nas for a man indicates the man’s oneness with his Lord and his belief in God’s names, attributes, and destiny, whether they are good or bad. The man’s recitation is for those who revive people. It indicates his health from the evil eye and envy, and is his injury evidence of recovery from it and recovery from it. The insight of the refugees shows the

title: The 100 most important interpretations of seeing the enemy defeated in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Hitting the enemy in a dream, dreaming of hitting the enemy in a dream carries many connotations and meanings and can bring good news and happy events to the dreamer, and it can bring with it sorrows and problems, and the interpreters depend in its interpretation on the condition of the dreamer and the dreamer. The details contained in the dream, and we will show you the details related to striking the enemy in the next article. Striking the enemy in a dream Striking the enemy in a dream has many connotations and meanings, namely: If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is striking the enemy in his eyes, this is clear evidence of his negligence in performing religious duties. If a person sees In his dream that he hits the enemy, there is a sign that he can find exemplary solutions to all the obstacles and adversities that he faces, whether they are related to his work or his life in general. If one suffers from a financial faltering and sees in a dream that the opponent is being beaten on the back, God will give him a lot of money To enable him to pay his debts in the near future. Hitting the enemy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the connotations and meanings associated with seeing the enemy beaten in a dream, which are: If the dreamer sees that he is hitting the enemy in the dream, this is a clear indication that he will prevail over opponents and haters. And he will eliminate them in the near future. If one sees in a dream that he is cruelly torturing his enemy, then there is a sign that enmity and hatred will end and the situation will be corrected in the coming period. Beating the enemy in a dream by Ibn Shaheen The great scholar Ibn Shaheen says that if the dreamer is free and sees in his dream that he is being beaten The enemy, then this dream indicates the beginning of a successful romantic relationship that will make him feel happy in the near future. Hitting the enemy in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi explained the meaning of seeing the enemy being hit in a dream, which indicates several things, which are: If the dreamer sees in his dream that the enemy is inside his house, This is a sign of conflicts and disagreements between family members. If someone dreams that his competitor is in the organization in which he works, this is a sign that he will be fired from his job due to serious disagreements with the manager. Hitting the enemy in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried girl dreams that she is hitting a woman, This is clear evidence that he is hurting her and causing her problems. If a girl sees in her dream that she is hitting a man, this is a sign that she will risk starting a new project, even though she does not have complete details about it, but she will succeed in it. Hitting the enemy in a dream for a married woman. Hitting the enemy in a dream for a married woman It has many meanings, which are: If the dreamer is married and sees in her dream that she will be able to confront the haters who want to separate her from her partner in reality. If the wife does not have children in reality and she sees that she is hitting the enemy in a dream, then this is clear evidence that God will grant her offspring. Good in the very near future. Dreaming that you are defeating your opponents in a dream indicates good luck and success on all fronts. Hitting the enemy in a pregnant woman’s dreamIf the dreamer is pregnant and sees in her dream that she is beating the enemy in a dream, this is a sign that she is oppressed and a target of those around her. Hitting the enemy In a

title: Interpretation of seeing rape in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about harassment

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rape in a dream Interpretation of a dream about molestation It has multiple interpretations and varies depending on the connotations of the dream, and what is distinctive is that the scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted dreams of rape and sexual search in a dream for more than one interpretation and visions. You may also be interested in: A piano in a dream Interpretation of seeing rape in a dream Interpretation of a dream about molestation Interpretation of a vision Ibn Sirin Rape and sexual harassment in a dream have more than one interpretation and meaning: By seeing rape in general in a dream and sexual harassment, Ibn Sirin explained that this person’s faith is weak and not strong, and not only that, but he performs actions that do not apply to his world and contradict Sharia, religion and rulings. It was also interpreted with another interpretation that if the dreamer was raped, his interpretation is that he has repressed sexual desires or is far from performing acts of obedience.Interpretation of seeing rape in a dream Interpretation of a dream of harassmentInterpretation of a dream of rape and sexual harassment of an unmarried girlMost of the interpretations related to the interpretation of a dream of rape and sexual harassment of a girl are not good and are considered A warning to her. These interpretations include: If the rape in the dream was incest, then its interpretation is that there will be a big problem between this person and the girl and it will be very difficult to solve. The second interpretation is that the girl was raped in the dream and did not resist, meaning that she is committing mistakes and shameful actions in her life and must stay away from it. All of that and improving her behavior. But if the rape occurred at the hands of a person with whom she has an emotional and romantic relationship, then this is a warning that this person will not have good intentions for the girl and will lie to her and will not marry her. You may also be interested in: Project in a dream Interpretation of a dream about rape for a married womanMost Interpretations of rape and sexual harassment in a dream on the married people’s channel is a warning to stay away from everything forbidden in her life that will lead to the permanent end of her life with her husband, so she must return to it permanently: If the person who raped a married woman is someone she really knows in her life, then this is considered a warning. She was worried that something dangerous would happen to her from this man. This is not true, but if the rape was by her husband, this is evidence that things between them are healthy and free of any marital problem. You may also be interested in: Symbols that indicate problems. Interpretation of a man’s dream of raping a girl in a dream. Most of the interpretations of this dream are not good at all, and all of them It warns that there will be no dangerous things that will happen in the future: If a man rapes a girl in a dream, its interpretation is that he is committing bad things, and all of these are disobedience and sins. As for the interpretation of a dream in which a man rapes a man, this dream is an indication that there is intense hostility between them and that one of them It will defeat the other and cause the other to defeat and lose, whether it is a job or a job. An amount of money. You may be interested: Condolences and black people in the dream. Interpretation of a single girl running away from someone trying to attack her. This dream is considered a good dream for a girl, especially if she manages to escape, because it reminds her of things in the future that she can avoid: A girl is running away from the man who is pursuing her, so the interpretation of this is that this the girl

title: Seeing a bag of money in a dream

preview.html: To see a bag of money in a dream, then money or money is a blessing from God, and it is one of the pleasures of the world. Without it, no one can buy any of the things and pleasures in the world and every country has its own currency. Seeing a bag of money in a dream indicates a prosperous and decent life. A safe and stable life, and it also indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires. A bag full of money in a dream. Seeing a bag of money in a married woman’s dream indicates the goodness that is coming her way. Seeing a bag full of money in The dream of a divorced or widowed woman indicates the loss of fatigue and pain, the loss of many futures, the achievement of what is desired and the prosperity of life. Seeing a bag full of banknotes in the dream of an unmarried woman means that she will hear good news and achieve success in her academic or professional life. Seeing paper money in a pregnant woman’s dream also indicates good offspring and ease of giving birth. Finding a bag of money in a dream Seeing finding a bag of money in a dream indicates the loss of anxiety and fatigue, and getting rid of the problems that haunt the dreamer. It also indicates exposure to many calamities. And sorrows, then comfort will soon come. This vision indicates quick wealth in a short period of time. Interpretation of a dream about money in my bag. If an unmarried girl sees a bag of money in her dream, this is good and indicates pleasant surprises that she does not expect and success in her life. Also, seeing a bag Money in a young man’s dream indicates that he will be exposed to many adversities, but God will reward him with abundant goodness and he will find a prestigious job or a profitable project that will bring him a lot of money. It also indicates that a married man has overcome difficult stages, has been promoted at work, and improved his social relationships. Interpretation of a dream about a bag containing money. If a divorced or widow sees that her wallet contains a lot of money, this indicates happy news that will change her life for the better and indicates wealth and riches after a while. This vision appears. For a married woman, there is also good for her situation, good for her life, and security and peace in her life. If a pregnant woman sees her bag full of money, this indicates the nearness of childbirth and her happiness with the child. Seeing a bag of money in a dream Seeing a bag full of money indicates good luck and the fulfillment of the dreamer’s or dreamer’s desires. It also indicates Improvement of the psychological conditions of the viewer or observer. Seeing a bag of money in a dream. A single purse shows that she has passed difficult stages and achieved what she wanted, as it indicates her marriage to a wealthy man. Interpretation of a dream of banknotes for a married woman. Seeing paper money in a married woman’s dream means good offspring, prosperity and happiness. And stability in her marital and family life. Interpretation of a dream about money from a green leaf: Seeing green money in a married woman’s dream indicates prosperity in her life and an improvement in her psychological and financial condition. Also, seeing green leaves in a married man’s dream means that he will achieve what he previously desired and that he will overcome crises and adversity. This vision also indicates an extraordinary future and multiple opportunities for success.TV

It also indicates that a married man has overcome difficult stages, has been promoted at work, and improved his social relationships. Interpretation of a dream about a bag containing money. If a divorced or widow sees that her wallet contains a lot of money, this indicates happy news that will change her life for the better and indicates wealth and riches after a while. This vision appears. For a married woman, there is also good for her situation, good for her life, and security and peace in her life. If a pregnant woman sees her bag full of money, this indicates the nearness of childbirth and her happiness with the child. Seeing a bag of money in a dream Seeing a bag full of money indicates good luck and the fulfillment of the dreamer’s or dreamer’s desires. It also indicates Improvement of the psychological conditions of the viewer or observer. Seeing a bag of money in a dream. A single purse shows that she has passed difficult stages and achieved what she wanted, as it indicates her marriage to a wealthy man. Interpretation of a dream of banknotes for a married woman. Seeing paper money in a married woman’s dream means good offspring, prosperity and happiness. And stability in her marital and family life. Interpretation of a dream about money from a green leaf: Seeing green money in a married woman’s dream indicates prosperity in her life and an improvement in her psychological and financial condition. Also, seeing green leaves in a married man’s dream means that he will achieve what he previously desired and that he will overcome crises and adversity. This vision also indicates an extraordinary future and multiple opportunities for success.TV

title: Interpretation of a dream about cooked chicken and rice

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cooked chicken and rice in a dream: If someone sees in a dream that he is served chicken with rice on the dining table, this is good news that he will obtain a new position in a prestigious position. Seeing cooked chicken with rice is a good sight. If one sees in his dream that he is cooking chicken And rice, this is a sign of sustenance with a lot of money, God willing. When someone sees in his dream that he is eating chicken and serving rice on the table. This indicates the viewer’s stability in his work, and it also indicates that he will receive a large financial reward. When someone sees in his dream He is baking chicken with rice. This may be an indication that he has a new position in his job and will have a high position in this position. When one dreams that he is cooking chicken himself and rice is in another pot but at the same time. This could be an indication that he is organized and diligent in his work. His professional and professional life. If someone dreams that he is cooking chicken and rice. It indicates that she is seeking the help of one of her relatives to guide her to the right path, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about a flood in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a flood in a dream by Al-OsaimiInterpretation of dreamsFlood in a dreamIt indicates the good that the dreamer will receive if it does not cause any harm in the dream. If someone sees a red flood in a dream, this indicates the problems and crises that the dreamer is going through. Seeing a flood and it was calm means marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream of a flood in a dream of a single womanAl-Osaimi confirmed that the flood in a dream indicates the goodness and happiness that this girl lives. If a girl sees in a dream that she is escaping from a flood, this indicates her desire to stay away from problems and worries. As for the dream of the flood entering the house without causing harm, this indicates an abundance of livelihood. Interpretation of a dream of a flood in a dream for a married womanWatching a water stormFloodThe house in a married woman's dream is evidence of financial crises that occur within her, especially if it causes the destruction of the house. As for a married woman's dream of a flood inside the house and causing a lot of damage, this is evidence of the increase in money and happiness that she and her husband live. Interpretation of a dream of a flood in a dream about a pregnant womanThe flood in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of an easy birth. The flood of the sea indicates The approaching date of birth. If a pregnant woman sees a flood and escapes from it, this indicates that she will get rid of problems. Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a man's dream The flood in a man's dream indicates the enemy present in the dreamer's life. Escaping from a flood in a man's dream indicates the end of problems and troubles. The dream of preventing a flood in a dream is evidence of getting rid of the crises and problems that the dreamer falls into. Floods in general are evidence of living. Add the dream you want to interpret by referring to the social status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing worms in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: So just pay attention, dear reader, to this article and you will find in it everything you want from the interpretation of seeing worms in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing worms for a single girl in a dreamIf an unmarried girl sees a lot of worms in her dream. This dream indicates that this single girl is busy with many issues and events. These events cause anxiety and stress in this single girl. Also, if an unmarried girl sees worms in her dream, they will be in her body. This dream shows that this single girl feels jealous. Also, if a girl sees worms in her hair in her dream. This indicates The dream indicates that the girl who is dreaming will marry a good man who will take care of her. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that many worms are coming out of her vagina. This dream indicates that there is a good sign for this girl who is dreaming. This dream also indicates that this girl will be blessed with offspring. Valid after her marriage. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that worms are coming out of the anus. This dream indicates that this unmarried girl will be cured by God Almighty from all the diseases that she suffers from. Interpretation of a dream about seeing worms in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of a worm Very large in her dream. This dream indicates that this married woman will provide her children with a lot of wealth. It also indicates that this married woman will hear very happy news that will bring her happiness. If a married woman sees black worms in her dream. This dream indicates that the married woman She will face some difficulties in her life, but these difficulties and obstacles will go away well. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of the dream of seeing worms in a pregnant woman’s dreamIf a pregnant woman sees worms coming out of her eyes, ears, and mouth in a dream. This dream indicates that a pregnant woman You will get better. This dream also indicates that the pregnant woman will be freed from worries and problems. She will also get rid of crises in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if the pregnant woman sees worms coming out of her vagina and they are white in color. This dream indicates that the pregnant woman will be blessed by God Almighty. Good offspring. Interpretation of seeing worms for a divorced woman in her dream. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that there are a lot of worms in her house. This dream indicates that this pregnant woman will get rid of problems and disagreements in her life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a divorced woman sees worms in her dream. This indicates The dream indicates an abundance of money. Also, this divorced woman will earn a lot of money. But if the pregnant woman sees that she is eating worms during her sleep. This dream indicates that this pregnant woman will earn a lot of halal money, and God is Great and All-Knowing. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream. Worms in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing worms in the hair in a dreamIf the dreamer sees that there are worms in his hair. This dream is different if the dreamer is male or female. If a girl sees that there are worms in her hair. This dream is evidence that this single girl will marry a man who will protect her. Wow

title: What is the interpretation of seeing an elephant in a dream?

preview.html: Hadouta website provides you with an explanation of how to see an elephant in a dream in its entirety. The elephant is known to be a huge animal that lives in African forests. The elephant is distinguished by its enormous size and cruelty, but it is one of the animals that is friendly to humans and it was possible to see it in a dream filled with many people in a complete dream. Therefore, we have collected for you everything related to the complete interpretation of seeing the birth of an elephant in a dream, where we present for you the complete symbol of the death of an elephant in a dream, as well as what is the interpretation of seeing a large elephant for elderly, married and pregnant women, as well as for men, from the largest books on the interpretation of dreams and visions. If you are interested in the explanation, just follow the article. What is the dream of an elephant Ibn SirinSeeing an elephant in a dream, as the great scholar Ibn Sirin said about it, is good news, and this indicates to the dreamer that he will soon visit the Sacred House of God during Hajj or Umrah. Also, An elephant in a dream is a symbol of pregnancy and childbirth if the dreamer asks about it. The interpretation of seeing a black elephant in the garden in a complete dream is one of the visions that show the dreamer that goodness and food will come in his next life and this is the beginning of the fulfillment of desires. Seeing salvation with a complete elephant in a dream indicates victory The dreamer over his enemies and haters, this is a sign of reconciliation over the enemy and victory. In general, an elephant in a dream is news that the dreamer will enter a calm and stable life, full of happiness and luxury, and this is a sign of abundance of food. See also: Why dream of seeing a rhinoceros or a unicorn in A dream: Why dream of a big elephant for a good woman? The interpretation of seeing a small elephant in a dream full of a single woman is one of the visions that portends a girl’s upcoming engagement to a good man and she will be happy with him. An elephant in a dream, full for an unmarried girl, is the greatest sign of marriage, and this is a sign of a strong husband who occupies A high position in society. Seeing an elephant in a dream for a girl also means success and success in her studies and work, and is a sign of achieving goals and success in her upcoming life. See also: Why dream of seeing a stuffed gorilla in a dreamWhy does an elephant dream in a dream of a married woman? Dream of giving birth to an elephant in A dream for a married woman is one of the good dreams that foreshadowed her proximity to eating a lamb, and an elephant in her dream generally indicates pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing a black elephant in a dream for a married woman is the greatest indication of the livelihood she will have in the next life and evidence of an abundance of money for her And for her family. In addition, seeing a whole pink elephant in a dream means for a woman comfort and stability in her marriage and the end of the problems she has suffered from. And well-being and tranquility prove this vision. See also: Why dream of seeing a dolphin in a complete dreamWhy does an elephant dream in a dream of a pregnant woman? Dream book An elephant in a dream for a pregnant woman is good news, blessings and one of her instructions to provide her with a male child, who will be her help and support in her life. Seeing A whole elephant in a dream also indicates an easy and affordable birth, which will go through in good health and protect itself

title: Interpretation of dates in a dream

preview.html: We offer you an interpretation of dates in a dream in different cases, as eating dates is from the Noble Prophetic Sunnah, and on the other hand it has many health benefits for the human body and helps in treating many diseases. But on the other hand, seeing it in a dream is strange and incomprehensible and makes its owner think that it looks good. Likewise, seeing it in a dream portends something happy for the dreamer, or does it indicate something unpleasant, or is it just a dream? This we will discover through an encyclopedia that provides you with an interpretation of this dream according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dates in a dream According to Ibn Sirin, seeing dates in a dream generally indicates goodness and livelihood, and it may also indicate piety, justice, and memorizing the Book of God. Whoever sees in his dream that he is distributing dates to those around him, this indicates that the owner of the vision is a generous person and interested in distributing alms in reality, and God knows best. If a man sees in a dream that he is getting an appointment from his mother or father in the event of their death, this indicates that the dreamer will receive help from someone close to him in reality. If a man sees in his dream that he is getting a date from a dead person, this is a good omen and that the owner of the vision will have a new opportunity to start a project that will bring him success. Interpretation of dates in a dream by Al-Nabulsi If a man sees in a dream that he is harvesting dates, this indicates his marriage to a righteous woman. And whoever dreams that he is eating dates, this indicates kindness and nourishment in reality. Whoever dreams that he is cutting dates and taking grains from them, this indicates that he will give birth to a male, and God knows best. Seeing dates scattered on the side of the road indicates something that the seer hates, which is Losing his money. Seeing an appointment in a dream means rain. Interpretation of dreams for a single woman Seeing an appointment in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will get married soon, God knows best, as well as in the case of buying. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating dates, this means that she will marry a wealthy, generous man. One of the symbols that dates bring in a single woman’s dream is that they indicate an abundance of money. Seeing eating dates in a single dream means success and success in reality. Interpretation of dates in a dream for a married woman Seeing eating dates in a married woman’s dream indicates the happiness she feels in reality and the stability of her marital life. Seeing the theft of dates in a married woman’s dream is an unpleasant vision that indicates a major problem with her husband that may lead to divorce, God knows best. If a married woman sees herself buying dates in a dream, this indicates kindness and livelihood represented in gaining money. An appointment in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is picking dates, this means kindness and abundant nutrition that will come from her child. Whoever sees in her dream that she is eating dates, this indicates that the woman in the dream is pregnant with a male child, God knows best. Seeing an appointment in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates She will give birth, and God knows best. We provide you with the most important interpretations of dates in a dream, and we must note that all of these interpretations that we have provided in this article are only interpretations of scholars of interpretation.
